content:
使用教学pvf
Script\monster\new_goblin\action\throw.act
调用测试投掷哥布林
核心代码解析

    [RESTORE]
    [HP]
        -99
    [%]

改成整数就是加血 无视玩家和怪物的无敌

 

模板

#PVF_File

[MOTION]
	[BASE ANI]
		`../animation/Throw.ani`
	[SOUND]
		`THROW_STONE`	0	
	[/SOUND]
	[SPEECH]
		`扣血效果`	1	100	
	[/SPEECH]
[/MOTION]
[TRIGGER]
	[FRAME]
		2	2	
	[WHICH]
	[ALL CHARACTER TEAM]
	[DO BEHAVIOR]
	[CHECKUP OBJECT]
		0	
[/TRIGGER]

[BEHAVIOR]
	[RESTORE]
	[HP]
		-99
	[%]
[/BEHAVIOR]
